skills.desc:
[Active Effect]

Exchanges remaining HP levels with a target enemy, then attacks with the default skill. Cannot be used on a boss.

[Passive Effect]

Gains an Extra Turn and decreases the cooldown of this Skill by 3 turns if this Champion's HP drops below 20% when attacked.
